name: Super Turtle Warrior: Ninja Fighter
description:
Play as Super Turtle Warrior as Ninja Fighter enter the New York city wars in this new free turtle warrior game, and you see your ninja fighting powers to attack enemies & take down deadly criminals and emerge as a turtle warrior real ninja fighter amongst their city attack. Save the NewYork city from real gangster crimes, evil crime lords, deadly gangsters of the New York city, and get rid of all the real gangster crimes from the city with your Ninja attack as a turtle hero ninja and action ninja hero fighter. Use full of your Ninj fighting skills and best tactical skills in this ninja fighting game against the street fighting enemies.
Become a super turtle warrior to finish the crime and criminals around the town. Reclaim your turf with your ninja and karate skills! This game is a combined fusion of action, fighting, and RPG adventures. By playing this ninja mutant simulator, you can aggravate the feelings like a hero in your heart because superheroes are here to end criminal away, unseen in futuristic battle games. Use amazing fighting tricks and advance attacking powers to deal with gangster and city mafia for maximum damage.This super turtle warrior is action based story game which is especially designed for super hero and ninja fighter lovers. Every single mission has a unique warrior fight challenge to overcome, skill to learn, and special attack, like mega mutant punch and kick! Protect grand city civilians, children cars, and buildings from harm.
The new and amazing Super turtle warrior: Ninja Fighter is here defeat the enemy elite warrior commando with turtle warrior and ninja fighting skills in super turtle game. The gangster and mafia have become more powerful then city police and other security forces.They need your help to finish these gangster and city criminals to mentain peace in the city.So don’t waste your time its time to help the civilienz to finish the crime from the city.As super turtle warrior grab your weapon and fight for survival of your city.
Super Turtle Warrior Adventure Features
- Smooth, easy, Addictive, intuitive & action story-based game play.
- Advanced attacking features with amazing animations.
- Super turtle warrior and ninja fighting powers.
- Adictive and action based sounds & visual effects.
- 15 unique adventurous and thrilling levels.
Play the breakout battle of challenging survival and shooting gameplay with an exciting & thrilling adventure of ninja vs Gangster missions.
